radirius.merc.graphics

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • radirius.merc.graphics.Color

  • public class Color
extends Object
    A class for Color, that will hold the three values; r, g, b, and a, and will darken, brighten, multiply, etc.
    Author:
    wessles
